record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="Doc mgmt analysis reports" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"

brief.brief: This is the Incident Analysis Reporting menu.
Use this menu to run various Incident Analysis reports.
The menu only displays reports you have the authorization to run.

detail.detail: F1 - Alert Status Report: Runs the Alert Status report using the report exerciser. The command to run this option is "asr".
F2 - Assignment Group Report: Runs the document by assignment group report using the report exerciser. The command to run this option is "agr".
F3 - Incident Management Menu: Returns you to the main Incident Management menu. The command to run this option is "pmm".
F4 - Document Report by: Runs the document by category report using the report exerciser. The command to run this option is "drc".
F5 - Excessive Reassignment: Runs the excessive reassignment report using the report exerciser. The command to run this option is "err".
F6 - Open Document Report: Runs the open document report using the report exerciser. The command to run this option is "odr".
F7 - Shift Change Report: Runs the shift Change report using the report exerciser. The command to run this option is "scr".
F8 - Incident Report-Component: Runs the document summary by component using the report exerciser. The command to run this option is "prcomp".
F9 - Incident Report-Vendor: Runs the document summary by vendor using the report exerciser. The command to run this option is "prvend".
F10 - Incident Report-Assignment: Runs the document summary by assignment group using the report exerciser. The command to run this option is "prassg".
F11 - Incident Report-Location: Runs the document summary by location using the report exerciser. The command to run this option is "prloc".
